## A simple purple theme

To use the theme, simply do:

```yaml
format: purple-revealjs
```

## Use Google Fonts

You can use Google Fonts. Just list them as an array with the `googlefonts` key:

```yaml
googlefonts: ["Poetsen One", "Ubuntu Mono", "Lato"]
```

You can customise the fonts in the `custom.scss` file.
